events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's report of wanting money back.
The case has been assigned to support agent Emily to assist with the refund process.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect order.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number for verification?
Sure, I have attached a photo of the item and my order number is 123456. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the information. I have processed your refund. You should see the money back on your card within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and for processing my refund; I appreciate your help.
The refund issue is now resolved. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and everything is satisfactory on your end.
Closing this case now as the refund has been processed and confirmed by the customer.
